pages.text: Pots are a decorative storage option. Fired Jars hold 4 stacks of a single item, while the Glazed Pots hold 8 stacks. Like Pots, Jars also keep their inventory when broken.
The Unfired Jar is crafted in preparation for the Fired Jar. Therefore, there is no storage associated with the Unfired Jar.
Fired and Glazed Jars need heat from the smelter to harden their clay and provide storage.
